string.comment: Issue tracker report instructions for the crash dialog. The %s placeholder is the name of the crash report template and always in English/LTR.
string.name: crash_dialog__report_instructions

resources.string: If you wish to report this error, first check out the issue tracker on GitHub if your crash has not already been reported.\nIf it hasn\'t, copy the generated crash log and open a new issue. Use the \"%s\" template and fill out the description, the steps to reproduce, and paste the generated crash log at the end. This helps in making FlorisBoard better and more stable for everyone. Thank you!

This feature requires hardware amplitude control support, which is missing on your device

Show number row on top of character layout
Show popup when you press a key
Space bar switches back to character layout
Pressing space bar automatically switches back to characters when in symbols or numeric

resources.string: Where do I get spell checker dictionaries?

string.comment: Intro for the dict sources info sheet
string.name: settings__spelling__dict_sources_info__intro

resources.string: FlorisBoard uses Nuspell as the spell checker engine, which means there is a vast amount of dictionaries available, as Hunspell is used by many other software as well. The list below shows a few hand-selected sources which the import manager supports. Download either the archive file or the dictionary files, then in the import manager choose the correct source (this is important to correctly read the archive format).

string.comment: Other text for the dict sources info sheet
string.name: settings__spelling__dict_sources_info__other

resources.string: if this list does not contain dictionaries for your language or dialect, you can also manually search for a Hunspell dictionary and import the \'aff\' and \'dic\' file for this.

resources.string: One last thing before you start the setup - if you encounter any bugs/crashes/issues with FlorisBoard or you have a feature request - head over to the GitHub repository linked below and file an issue. This helps in improving the experience for all users!

string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup
string.name: setup__welcome__intro

resources.string: Thanks for trying out FlorisBoard! Before you can start using it, we have to do the usual stuff and enable it in the system settings, set up your preferred language/layout, etc… But no worries - the setup wizard will guide you through this!

string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup
string.name: setup__welcome__outro

resources.string: To start the setup, click on NEXT.

string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup
string.name: setup__welcome__privacy

resources.string: FlorisBoard does fully respect your privacy and does not collect any user data. For more info see here:

string.comment: Title of Welcome fragment in Setup
string.name: setup__welcome__title

string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup
string.name: setup__welcome__trust

resources.string: The source code for FlorisBoard is publicly accessible for anyone, so you can easily review what FlorisBoard does in the background. Check out the repository link below.

string.comment: Content description for the quick action toggle button in Smartbar
string.name: smartbar__quick_action_toggle__alt

resources.string: Quick action toggle. If pressed, toggles between the word suggestions and the quick action buttons.

What's new in 0.3.13?
 

Spell checker service (Typing > Group Correction > Spell checker)

New audio/haptic feedback settings (Keyboard > Group Key press > Sounds & vibration)

Inline autofill support for your password manager (Android 11+ only)

Japanese JIS layout (thanks @Waelwindows)

Support for direct boot

For more new features see the changelog!
 
 
 What has been fixed?
 

Gestures are correctly detected again

Copy/cut works correctly again

Performance improvements

Keyboard settings are now accessible from the system language & input screen

Prevent infinite crash loops if something goes wrong during keyboard initialization

For more fixes see the changelog!
 
 
 Exact changelog: https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/releases/tag/v0.3.13
